examples: True to their reputations, Paul was a smoothie who put a public relations gloss on everything he said, and John was abrasive and sarcastic, speaking his mind and letting the chips fall where they may.

entries.meaning: A drink made from whole fruit, thus thicker than fruit juice.
(figurative) A blending of different things, a mishmash
A member of the mod subculture who is relatively non-violent and wears expensive clothing.
examples: The decision to cool myself made the next two years the hardest I had done because it meant being a smoothie and staying out of trouble, which in prison is difficult, […]
